{"id":578621782,"lang":"cpp","time":"3 weeks, 2 days","timestamp":1635441023,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"64 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/578621782/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"20 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        vector<vector<int>> res;\n        sort(nums.begin(),nums.end());\n        int n = nums.size();\n        for(int i=0;i<n-2;i++){\n            if(i > 0 && nums[i]==nums[i-1])\n                continue;\n            int l=i+1;\n            int r=n-1;\n            while(l<r){\n                int sum = nums[i]+nums[l]+nums[r];\n                if(sum<0)\n                    l++;\n                else if(sum>0)\n                    r--;\n                else{\n                    res.push_back(vector<int>{nums[i],nums[l],nums[r]});\n                    while(l+1<r && nums[l]==nums[l+1])\n                        l++;\n                    while(l<r-1 && nums[r]==nums[r-1])\n                        r--;\n                    l++;\n                    r--;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum"}
